import "./testimonials.scss"; export default function Testimonials() { const data = [ { id: 1, name: "Tom", title: "Senior Developer", img: "https://images.pexels.com/photos/1680172/pexels-photo-1680172.jpeg?auto=compress&cs=tinysrgb&dpr=2&w=500", icon: "assets/twitter.png", desc: "Writing.....", }, { id: 2, name: "Alex", title: "Co-Founder XYZ", img: "https://images.pexels.com/photos/428321/pexels-photo-428321.jpeg?auto=compress&cs=tinysrgb&dpr=2&w=500", icon: "assets/youtube.png", desc: "Writing...... ", featured: true, }, { id: 3, name: "Martin", title: "CEO", img: "https://images.pexels.com/photos/3863793/pexels-photo-3863793.jpeg?auto=compress&cs=tinysrgb&dpr=2&w=500", icon: "assets/linkedin.png", desc: "Writing...... ", }, ]; return (

Testimonials

{data.map((d) => (
{d.desc}

{d.name}

{d.title}

))}
); }
